--- layout: default ---

np_nifalcon

Max/MSPPureData

Description: external for using the Novint Falcon Haptic Device with Max/MSP or Pd

Code Repo: http://github.com/qdot/np_nifalcon

Binaries and Releases: http://sourceforge.net/projects/np-externals/files/np_nifalcon/

See Also:

  • libnifalcon - Library for cross platform communication with the novint falcon
  • Edgar Robothands - When the Robots Get Loose - Example of performance using np_nifalcon

np_lightstone

Max/MSPPureData

Description: external for using the Journey to Wild Divine Lightstone Biometrics Widget with Max/MSP or Pd

Code Repo: http://github.com/qdot/np_lightstone

Binaries and Releases: http://sourceforge.net/projects/np-externals/files/np_lightstone/

np_virtualhole

COMING SOON

Description: external for using the Segment Virtual Hole with Max/MSP or Pd. Seeing this is for the prototype, and I may have the last one that exists, I'm not sure how useful this will be to anyone, but hey, it's here.

Code Repo: http://github.com/qdot/np_virtualhole

Binaries and Releases: http://sourceforge.net/projects/np-externals/files/np_virtualhole/
